title: MysqlPlayerDataBridge-v3.29.5的问题
txt_content:
[13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/WARN]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Database connection failed. Reconnecting... [13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Connecting to the database... [13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Your MySQL server seems to not support character encoding utf8. Support for special characters is disabled! To enable this update your MySQL server version to 5.5 or newer!
数据库没有问题 使用8.0版本mysql   配置也没问题 不知道为什么就是这样

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试更改数据库使用的字符集
https://juejin.im/post/5ca55f13f265da309651a80a

xmdhs 发表于 2019-11-14 15:46
尝试更改数据库使用的字符集
https://juejin.im/post/5ca55f13f265da309651a80a
使用的是utf8编码 没问题

replies.author: HYFan_Meng
replies.txt_content:
226821 发表于 2019-11-14 19:42
使用的是utf8编码 没问题[13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/WARN]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Database connection failed. Reconnecting... 
[13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Connecting to the database... [13:14:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 5/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Your MySQL server seems to not support character encoding utf8. Support for special characters is disabled! To enable this update your MySQL server version to 5.5 or newer!
他意思是你的MySQL版本太老了导致MySQL不支持utf8字符编码
你试试用phpStudy这个软件
